summary: This is the master file for all my Skyrim plugins. It links player choices and sets up scripted encounters in various mods, and also controls order of presentation.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description:[/b]
The someguyseries.esm is a master file that regulates content in all of Someguy2000's quest mods. It Manages order of presentation, dialogue choices, and scripted encounters that span multiple mods.

This is [i]only[/i] the master file! You must download each of my mods at its respective page to play it:
[i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22722/?]Sword of Sigdan[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61441/?]Immersive Idiots: Roderick Redbeard
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72817?]Blood of the Nord[/url][/i]

Stay abreast of the latest developments on [url=https://twitter.com/Someguy_Modder]Twitter[/url].

Check out trailers, developer diaries, and mod reviews at [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/Someguy2000Modder]my Youtube channel[/url].

[b]Installation[/b]:
Extract the contents of the "Someguy Series" folder from the archive into your Skyrim data folder. Activate the someguyseries.esm, and ensure it's placed with the other .esm's in your load order.

[b]Permissions:[/b]
Do not copy or redistribute this mod without my explicit permission. This is a Nexus-exclusive mod.

Commercial use strictly prohibited.
author: Someguy2000
